== Porunnanore (627306) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Porunnanore is a village in the [[Mananthavady]] taluka of [[Wayanad]] district with an area of 2865 hectares and harbouring 4753 households with total population of 22137 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kalpetta]] is at a distance of 40 km. Male population is 10909 and female population is 11228. Scheduled Caste Population is 450 and Scheduled Tribes population is 3909. Census Location Code of the village is 627306<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.

* Total literate population: 16851 (76.12%)
* Literate male population: 8767 (80.36%)
* Literate female population: 8084 (72.0%)
